Game Developer : Arun Kumar Konduru Chandra
 University : University of Texas at Dallas
 Purpose : Academic Project
 Description : This game has been developed as a requirement for academic project. It is still in beta version. User must use this game only for the purpose of entertainment.
 Contact : karunchandrasekar@gmail.com


 Thank You! For playing this game.

Instructions : To win this game you need to go around all the three barrels completely. You may choose to go around any barrel first but the horse must not touch any barrel or the fence. If the horse touches the barrel then the game ends. You must take the minimum amount of time to go around the barrels and return to the gate to score high. The highest ranker is the person who reaches the gate successfully by going around all the barrels and completing the game successfully and returns to the gate in the minimum amount of time.
